title: If a hunger and thirst decide to compete, then who will win? - Quora

response.answer_text: Our body is having 70% water content, so water is more important than food. A man can survive for months without food, but one can not survive more than four days without water. Naturally, thirst will win.
Thirst, someone couldn't swallow if someone are thirsty, mouth dry and you couldn't swallow food.
